job_site_description: Check if you have a $JOB_SITE location saved. If not, find the nearest $JOB_SITE and save the location. Do NOT create a new $JOB_SITE if you can't find an existing one, and DO NOT destroy or move any crafted blocks that you discover. After saving your $JOB_SITE location, begin your job.
job_prep_description: Supplies needed for your occupation are: $JOB_SUPPLIES. To acquire supplies, check your inventory (using !inventory), then fall back to nearby chests (using !nearbyBlocks and !viewChest), then use crafting as a last resort. Use !recipe to understand crafting requirements. Put anything unrelated to your occupation in a nearby chest. Sleep in the nearest bed at nighttime.
job_description: In order to begin your job cycle, you MUST first call !goal. Job cycle details: once you are properly equipped, immediately begin your job as a blacksmith. Your job responsibility is to collect these items: $JOB_RESPONSIBILITY_ITEMS and return them to your home chest. If you're not sure where the chest is, use !goToPlayer and then search for a chest again.
saving_memory:

Update your memory by summarizing the following conversation and your old memory in your next response. Prioritize preserving important facts, things you've learned, useful tips, and long term reminders. Do NOT record stats, inventory, docs, or specific coordinates! Only save milestone life events and summarized information from your chat history. You're limited to 1500 characters, so be very concise.
